# Jail (Building)
## Overview
**Jail**

**Create** 40 Goods, 5 Influence, 33 Labor (1,610 gp)

**Rooms** 4 [[Cell (Room)|Cells]], 1 [[Guard Post (Room)|Guard Post]], 1 [[Office (Room)|Office]], 1 [[Storage (Room)|Storage]], 1 [[Torture Chamber (Room)|Torture Chamber]]

A fortified structure for confining criminals.
